This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $800000. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
